short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize web content, generate mindmaps, and personalize your learning experience with HitWit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The HitWit learning extension allows registered HitWit users to get text summaries and mind maps of their current web page, and launch their deep learning sessions on HitWit.
